page.title: 02 PITKERRO HOUSE
page.content: Pitkerro house is one of the oldest houses in Scotland.On this old side of the building there is a door with 1593 marked on it ,this was when the house was built.Pitkerro house has been owned by many people,for instance{Mary {Queen of Scots}lived there she planted a tree which is still standing in 1985. It has grown so big it has split its bark.A great author named {Charles Kingsley}also lived in Pitkerro House.Pitkerro house was one of the first buildings to have electricity,used for lighting only. The power came from a battery in the battery house to the left hand side of the building. But since being a listed building it cannot be touched.
